reviewText: It's not pretty.  It's not flashy.  Theres no story.  It's full of dumb jokes and laughable Characters".\n\nBut after an hour of play; it's got tight controls (Didn't find a way to remap
recommended: I was too busy playing the game to really look)
voteText: easy to understand but difficult to master AI
helpfulPercent: and the upgrade/ship system adds something I've never really experianced before in the genre.  The soundtrack is pretty sweet
votesTotal: and I wish I could get it as a DLC (In Lossless format
votesFunny: please).\n\nIn short; it's a diamond in the rough.  Even at full price ($1.99 at the time of this review)
commentsCount: it's worth the coin and I got it on sale.  I've paid a lot more for a lot less.  Fans of the genre; get this. It's not perfect
column20: 19 of 22 people (86%) found this review helpful 1 person found this review funny

reviewText: I think there are better games at similarly low prices on Steam.  Infinite Shooter is underwhelming: few sound effects, little music, amateurish artwork, barebones menus.  Plenty of other options that pack more of a punch than this game does.
